KEMONO_ARCHIVER_BAN_URL.comment: BAN url prefix (for varnish purging and the like) - http://10.0.0.1:8313

KEMONO_ARCHIVER_PUBKEY.comment: Public encryption key for key contribution and autoimport. Generate one with `openssl genrsa -out privatekey.txt 4096 && openssl rsa -in privatekey.txt -pubout -out publickey && cat publickey` as seen above, it is highly recommended you use 4096bit keys... session tokens can get too long for 2048 quite easily.

KEMONO_ARCHIVER_SALT.comment: (static) salt for autoimport key hashing. you should change this once and keep it safe.
